spans.text: CHAPTER 3 RURAL SETTLEMENT AND URBAN SETTLEMENT
A settlement is a grouping of people, buildings, communication
networks and activities that function as a single, integrated
system on a regular, daily basis.
Low-order function: Needed on a daily basis; has a small
sphere of influence, small range and small threshold
High-order function: Needed less often; has a large sphere
of influence, large range and large threshold population.
Sphere of influence is the area served by a function or
A hospital has a high-order function and people are
prepared to travel great distances to use this service.
A hospital needs a large threshold population and therefore
a large sphere of influence is needed.
A light industry is an industry that uses small quantities of
raw materials and causes little pollution.
Reasons why the bakery does not have to be located outside
Only needs a small piece of land
Reasons why it is important for the bakery to have a central
Must be close to the consumers
Reasons why people are attracted to the settlement:
Variety of services (e.g hospital, bank, transport)
Job opportunities in many different economic activities
Higher paid jobs in secondary and tertiary sectors

Chapters.Title:
2014
Mind the Gap CAPS Grade
Text:
on 2014
Mind the Gap CAPS Grade 12 Geography 
CHAPTER 3 RURAL SETTLEMENT AND URBAN SETTLEMENT  71
Chapter
3
Answers to activity 3.6
1. a)  A settlement is a grouping of people, buildings, communication 
networks and activities that function as a single, integrated 
system on a regular, daily basis. 33  
(2)
b) It is an urban settlement. 33 
(2)
c) It is multifunctional33/Secondary and tertiary functions  
are shown.33 
(any 1) (2)
2. a)  Low-order function: Needed on a daily basis; has a small 
sphere of influence, small range and small threshold 
population33 
(2)
 
High-order function: Needed less often; has a large sphere  
of influence, large range and large threshold population.33 (2)
b) Low-order: Bakery/Café/Flour mill33 
 
High order: SABC/Hospital/Bank/Chem-Lab Research 33 
 
(any 1) (2)
c) Sphere of influence is the area served by a function or  
service 33 
(2)
d) Hospital 33 
(2)
e) A hospital has a high-order function and people are  
prepared to travel great distances to use this service.33  
(2)
 
A hospital needs a large threshold population and therefore  
a large sphere of influence is needed.33 
(2)
3. a)  A light industry is an industry that uses small quantities of  
raw materials and causes little pollution.33  
(2)
b) Reasons why the bakery does not have to be located outside 
the city:
• 
Little air pollution 33
• 
Little noise pollution 33
• 
No bad odours (bad smells) 33
• 
No dangerous activities 33
• 
Only needs a small piece of land 33 
(any 2) (4)
c) Reasons why it is important for the bakery to have a central 
location:
• 
Products are perishable (can go bad) 33
• 
Must be close to the consumers 33
• 
More accessible 33 
(any 2) (4)
4. a)  Reasons why people are attracted to the settlement:
• 
Variety of services (e.g hospital, bank, transport) 33
• 
Job opportunities in many different economic activities33
• 
Higher paid jobs in secondary and tertiary sectors 33
• 
Good infrastructure 33
• 
Entertainment33 
(any 2) (4)
